message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. I believe it has a lot of potential to benefit your business. With that said, I'm willing to start with an offer of $1,300,000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer. While I agree the product has potential, that price point is a little high for me.  I'd be willing to purchase the product for $1,050,000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to lower the price to $1,200,000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, as the product is still worth a significant amount to me.
